mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id AS boardId, s.students_id AS studentsId, s.students_name AS studentsName, b.title, b.content, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(b.update_at,'%Y-%m-%d'),'-') AS updateAt, DATE_FORMAT(b.create_at,'%Y-%m-%d') AS createAt FROM board AS b INNER JOIN students AS s ON b.students_id = s.students_id
